Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill allows you to trigger scenes via the Smartlife Connect platform.

Steps to use the skill 

1) Install the Smartlife Connect skill.
2) Use the login given to you by your technician to connect the Smartlife connect. 
3) Talk to Echo "Alexa, discover devices.". Wait till Echo says, "Discover is completed."
4) Now that the setup is done, You can ask Alexa to trigger Smartlife Connect scenes. 

Here are some examples you can ask* Alexa. 

Alexa activate the movie mode.
Alexa activate the game mode.

*Note: Since Smartlife Connect is a custom automation platform, your automation technician will guide you with available scenes in your house.
